Package com.tyndalehouse.step.core.service

Interface BibleInformationService

All Known Implementing Classes:
BibleInformationServiceImpl
public interface BibleInformationService
Interface to the service that gives information about the books of the bible, the different types of bible, etc. This service will mainly use JSword but may also rely on other data sources to display text.

    • UNAVAILABLE_TO_UI

      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • getAvailableModules

      List<BibleVersion> getAvailableModules(boolean allVersions, String locale, Locale usersLocale)
      Queries Jsword to return all the installed versions of the bible
      Parameters:
      allVersions - a boolean indicating whether all versions should be returned
      locale - the locale of the requester
      usersLocale - the locale of the user
      Returns:
      all the available versions of the bible

    • getPassageText

      OsisWrapper getPassageText(String version, String reference, String lookupOptions, String interlinearVersion, String interlinearMode, String userLanguage)
      This method selects passage text and forms XML for the client. This is done server side so that the client does not need to render each div individually.
      Parameters:
      version - the initials that identify the bible version
      reference - the reference
      lookupOptions - options to set for retrieval
      interlinearVersion - version to use as the interlinear
      interlinearMode - indicates if we are interested in interleaving, proper interlinear, comparing, etc.
      Returns:
      the HTML string passed back for consumption

    • getPassageText

      OsisWrapper getPassageText(String version, int startVerseId, int endVerseId, String lookupOptions, String interlinearVersion, Boolean round)
      This method selects passage text and forms XML for the client. This is done server side so that the client does not need to render each div individually.
      Parameters:
      version - the initials that identify the bible version
      startVerseId - the start of the passage, as a numeral
      endVerseId - the end of the passage, as a numeral
      lookupOptions - options to set for retrieval
      interlinearVersion - version to use as the interlinear
      round - true to round the passage up/down
      Returns:
      the HTML string passed back for consumption

    • getAllFeatures

      List<EnrichedLookupOption> getAllFeatures()
      Gets a list of all supported features so far
      Returns:
      the list of lookup options available to the user

    • getBibleBookNames

      List<BookName> getBibleBookNames(String bookStart, String version, String bookScope)
      returns a list of matching names or references in a particular book
      Parameters:
      bookStart - the name of the matching key to look across book names
      version - the name of the version, defaults to ESV if not found
      bookScope - a restriction on an OSIS reference book
      Returns:
      a list of matching bible book names

    • getBibleBookNames

      List<BookName> getBibleBookNames(String bookStart, String version, boolean autoLookupSingleBooks)
      returns a list of matching names or references in a particular book
      Parameters:
      bookStart - the name of the matching key to look across book names
      version - the name of the version, defaults to ESV if not found
      autoLookupSingleBooks - true to indicate we want to lookup chapters if we only get 1 book back
      Returns:
      a list of matching bible book names

    • hasCoreModules

      boolean hasCoreModules()
      Checks a set of core versions to see if they have been installed
      Returns:
      true if the core modules have been installed

    • installDefaultModules

      void installDefaultModules()
      installs the default modules (such as KJV, ESV, Strongs, Robinson)

    • installModules

      void installModules(int installerIndex, String reference)
      installs separate modules
      Parameters:
      installerIndex - the id/index of the installer in the loaded STEP application
      reference - the reference, initials or book name

    • getSiblingChapter

      KeyWrapper getSiblingChapter(String reference, String version, boolean previousChapter)
      Returns the previous or next chapter
      Parameters:
      reference - the reference
      version - the version of the book we are interested in
      previousChapter - true for previous chapter, false for next chapter
      Returns:
      the new reference to display on the user screen

    • index

      void index(String initials)
      Indexes a book
      Parameters:
      initials - initials of the book (e.g. KJV)

    • reIndex

      void reIndex(String initials)
      Re-Indexes a book
      Parameters:
      initials - initials of the book (e.g. KJV)

    • getKeyInfo

      KeyWrapper getKeyInfo(String reference, String sourceVersion, String version)
      Obtains information about a particular key, including its OSIS ID
      Parameters:
      reference - the reference we are looking up
      sourceVersion - the version attached to the reference
      version - the initials of the version we are wanting to look up 'reference' in.
      Returns:
      a wrapper around the info retrieved

    • expandKeyToChapter

      KeyWrapper expandKeyToChapter(String sourceVersion, String version, String reference)
      Takes a reference and returns the chapter it is part of
      Parameters:
      sourceVersion - the version attached to the reference
      version - the version to lookup the key in
      reference - the reference that we are interested in
      Returns:
      the new reference with full chapter

    • getProgressOnInstallation

      double getProgressOnInstallation(String version)
      Parameters:
      version - the version to be queried for
      Returns:
      a value between 0.0 and 1.0 indicating the progress so far

    • getProgressOnIndexing

      double getProgressOnIndexing(String version)
      Parameters:
      version - the version that is being indexed
      Returns:
      a value between 0.0 and 1.0 indicating the progress so far

    • removeModule

      void removeModule(String initials)
      Removes a module
      Parameters:
      initials - initials of the module to remove, e.g. 'WEB'

    • indexAll

      void indexAll()
      Indexes all modules, sequentially and synchronously, not in parallel

    • getPlainText

      String getPlainText(String version, String reference, boolean firstVerseOnly)
      Parameters:
      version - the version of interest
      reference - the reference of interest
      firstVerseOnly - true to indicate only the first verse should be retrieved
      Returns:

    • getStrongNumbersAndSubjects

      StrongCountsAndSubjects getStrongNumbersAndSubjects(String version, String reference, String userLanguage)
      Gets the strong numbers for a particular verse.
      Parameters:
      version - the version attached to the reference
      reference - the reference to be looked up
      Returns:
      the strong numbers return keyed by OSIS ID

    • getArrayOfStrongNumbers

      PassageStat getArrayOfStrongNumbers(String version, String reference, PassageStat stat, String userLanguage)
      Gets the strong numbers statistics for an array of strong number.
      Parameters:
      version - the version attached to the reference
      reference - (passage, eg: Gen 1)
      stat - the array of strong numbers
      Returns:
      the PassageStat

    • convertReferenceForBook

      KeyWrapper convertReferenceForBook(String reference, String sourceVersion, String targetVersion)
      Converts a reference from the source versification to the target versification
      Parameters:
      reference - the reference itself
      sourceVersion - the versification of the given reference
      targetVersion - our chosen final versification
      Returns:

      void addDirectoryInstaller(String directoryPath)
      Installs all modules from a particular directory
      Parameters:
      directoryPath - the directory path
